text:
Hello everyone! :wave:
Can I build a whole HubSpot theme with React? I know I can make modules with React cms boilerplate, but can I do the whole theme with React? Can I use something like `HubSpotAutoUploadPlugin` or `CopyWebpackPlugin` to achieve this? Thanks!
I won’t say it’s impossible, but I definitely wouldn’t recommend it for 99% of sites on HubSpot.
